item.title: teaching material
item.description: courses and material this year I have supervised bsc theses at Erasmus School of Economics on the following papers: Vichi and Kiers (2001) Bluszcz (2016) the last two years I taught pratical classes during the Statistics course for bsc students at LUISS University of Rome material: one; two; three; answers one answers two answers three this year I taught pratical classes during the Statistics course for bsc students at LUISS University of Rome
